questions.question: Which of these sentences is grammatically incorrect?
options: I didn't do anything at all
I didn't do nothing at all
questions.correct_answer: I didn't do nothing at all

questions.question: Which of these sentences is grammatically incorrect?
In this paragraph, the author is trying to convince you to buy a new car. Which sentence is most likely to be in the article?
options: The new car is a great value
The new car is a bad value
The new car is a good value
The new car is a terrible value
questions.correct_answer: The new car is a great value

questions.question: In this paragraph, the author is trying to convince you to buy a new car. Which sentence is most likely to be in the article?
options: The new car is a great value
The new car is a bad value
The new car is a good value
The new car is a terrible value
questions.correct_answer: The new car is a great value

questions.question: Write a sentence that describes a person who is very good at speaking in public
questions.correct_answer: A person who is very good at speaking in public is an eloquent speaker

questions.question: Write a sentence that describes a person who is very good at speaking in public
questions.correct_answer: A person who is very good at speaking in public is an eloquent speaker

questions.question: Give a speech that persuades your audience to vote for you in the upcoming election
Give a speech that persuades your audience to vote for you in the upcoming election
